name: Sex Simulator - CamGirl Audition 2
description:
A sex simulation game with visual novel elements, where you play the role of an attractive woman looking for models for her studio.

GAME DESCRIPTION

If you're a fan of sexy scenes between women, Sex Simulator - CamGirl Audition 2 will give you plenty of them.
Follow the story of each of the three models who came to your studio and make them show you what they’re capable of.
If they seem confident enough in front of the camera, invite them for some solo sessions where they can get as dirty as they want.
Dare to put them in various sexual positions and follow how they’re enjoying themselves just for you.

This video game features an arousing gameplay, high-resolution images and videos, realistic-looking characters, elegant environments, and steamy storylines.

FEATURES
90+ HD quality renders
HD animations
